Name: Hexield
About the game: Turn-based battles with a simultaneous system of moves Two players using their elementals must destroy the enemy base. Select an elemental , order it to move or attack, select the next one.. and finish your turn . At this time, your opponent will also choose actions for his elementals and the battle will begin! Destroy the enemy's base to win. Using the Main system, each player will have priority in battle, use this to predict the behavior of the enemy. Get Hexes (coins) every turn and spend them. Actions are available to you: Create a new Elemental Add life to your Elemental Destroy the enemy elemental Freezing Elemental Teleportation Wall The number of features will increase as the game progresses
